item.title: 股东推动 Seven & i 与 Couche-Tard 接触
item.description: 日本 Seven & i 控股公司的一名股东正就其 475 亿美元的收购方案向该公司施压，要求其与 Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc.【原文：A shareholder in Japan’s Seven & i Holdings Co. is pressuring the company to engage “more deeply” with Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc. over its $47.5 billion buyout approach.】

item.title: 卢特尼克称特朗普坚持美国铝钢关税时间表
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）表示，他预计原定于本周三生效的25%钢铝进口关税不会得到缓和。【原文：US Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick signaled he doesn’t expect a reprieve on 25% tariffs for steel and aluminum imports scheduled to take effect on Wednesday.】

item.title: Veritas Said 计划将 Cambium 和 Houghton Mifflin Harcourt 合并
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Veritas Capital 正在研究合并 Cambium Learning Group 和 Houghton Mifflin Harcourt 这两家与教育相关的投资组合公司。【原文：Veritas Capital is working on a combination of Cambium Learning Group and Houghton Mifflin Harcourt, two of its education-related portfolio companies, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 波动性交易者陶醉于 S&P 500 指数在关税驱动下的剧烈波动
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的贸易战引发的市场动荡，让那些喜欢波动的期权交易商们爱不释手。【原文：Options traders who thrive on volatility are loving the market turbulence sparked by President Donald Trump’s trade fights.】

item.title: 如果马斯克将乌克兰排除在 "星链 "之外，波兰或将寻求替代方案
item.description: 波兰外长表示，如果埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）关闭其为乌克兰提供的星链（Starlink）卫星互联网系统，波兰可能会寻求其他供应商。【原文：Poland’s foreign minister said the country may seek other suppliers if Elon Musk were to turn off his Starlink satellite-internet system for Ukraine.】

item.title: 债券市场的特朗普交易看起来像是衰退交易
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统混乱的关税计划和联邦劳动力削减有可能进一步抑制经济增长的步伐，债券交易员们发出了美国经济将陷入停滞的越来越大的风险信号。【原文：Bond traders are signaling an increasing risk that the US economy will stall as President Donald Trump’s chaotic tariff rollouts and federal-workforce cuts threaten to further restrain the pace of growth.】

item.title: 不可能的三位一体 "难题导致亚洲资金紧张
item.description: 亚洲最大的几家中央银行正在接受痛苦的经济理论复习。【原文：Some of Asia’s biggest central banks are getting a painful refresher in economic theory.】

item.title: 苹果以罕见的年初产品狂潮一扫颓势
item.description: 苹果公司在两周内疯狂发布了最新的入门级 iPhone、新款 iPad 和升级版 Mac，甚至推迟了 Siri 功能的推出。此外：公司继续探索不同的眼镜理念，最新的 iOS 测试版软件增加了 Vision Pro 应用程序和新的人工智能功能。【原文：Apple just cleared the decks by releasing its latest entry-level iPhone, new iPads and upgraded Macs in a two-week frenzy — even as it delays Siri features. Also: The company continues to explore different glasses ideas, and the latest iOS beta software adds a Vision Pro app and new AI capabilities.】

item.title: 美国优先 "光环褪去，美国市场落后于全球
item.description: 在整个金融市场，美国不再是第一。【原文：Across financial markets, America is no longer first.】

item.title: 中国敦促酒店安装电子秤以应对肥胖率上升问题
item.description: 中国卫生部概述了一系列措施，包括敦促酒店安装体重秤，以解决中国肥胖率上升的问题。【原文：China’s health ministry outlined a range of measures, including urging hotels to install scales, to address the country’s rising obesity rate.】

item.title: 部长称印度 "接近 "削减消费税并合理调整税率
item.description: 印度财政部长尼尔马拉-西塔拉曼（Nirmala Sitharaman）表示，印度即将降低商品和服务税，税率合理化工作已进入最后阶段。【原文：India is close to reducing its goods and services tax and work on rationalizing rates is in its final stages, Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman said.】

item.title: 路透社称美国终止伊拉克向伊朗购买电力的豁免权
item.description: 据路透社报道，美国没有延长允许伊拉克从伊朗购买电力的豁免权，这是美国试图在经济上对德黑兰施压的一部分。【原文：The US didn’t renew a waiver that allowed Iraq to buy electricity from Iran as part of an attempt to pressure Tehran economically, Reuters reported.】

item.title: 北京将推出儿童人工智能课程，促进行业发展
item.description: 北京的学校将为中小学生开设人工智能课程，以加强中国在该领域占据主导地位的目标。【原文：Schools in Beijing will introduce artificial intelligence courses to primary and secondary students to strengthen China’s goal to dominate the sector.】

item.title: 中国消费通胀率年内首次降至零点以下
item.description: 中国的消费通胀率 13 个月来首次降至零以下，这一读数受到季节性因素的影响，但也提醒人们经济中持续存在的通货紧缩压力。【原文：China’s consumer inflation dropped below zero for the first time in 13 months, a reading skewed by seasonal distortions but also a reminder of persistent deflationary pressures in the economy.】

item.title: 13.3万亿美元损失后，印度努力摆脱悲观情绪
item.description: 即使在前所未有的连败降低了股票估值之后，全球基金经理们也并不急于大举买入印度股票。【原文：Global fund managers are in no rush to load up on Indian stocks even after an unprecedented losing streak has lowered equity valuations.】

item.title: 制裁正在纠缠而非阻止中国的伊朗石油贸易
item.description: 随着成本上升，越来越多的贸易商不得不冒险规避美国的措施，对被指协助德黑兰的公司和油轮实施的一轮又一轮制裁终于减缓了伊朗石油流向中国的速度。【原文：Successive rounds of sanctions on companies and tankers said to be aiding Tehran are finally slowing the flow of Iranian oil to China, as costs rise and more traders are compelled to engage in risky efforts to circumvent US measures.】

item.title: 关税风险逼近，美国通胀将保持坚挺
item.description: 美国 2 月份消费者物价的上涨速度可能表明，美联储官员在评估特朗普政府刮起的政策旋风时，对通胀问题的进展仍持观望态度。【原文：US consumer prices probably rose in February at a pace that illustrates plodding progress on inflation for Federal Reserve officials content to remain on the sidelines as they assess a policy whirlwind from the Trump administration.】

item.title: 通胀挂钩债券因特朗普关税而反弹：信贷周刊
item.description: 在关税及其对生活成本的影响存在不确定性的情况下，基金经理们正蜂拥购买对冲通胀的债券。【原文：Money managers are flocking to bonds that hedge against inflation amid uncertainty about tariffs and their impact on the cost of living.】

item.title: 南非民主党表示只支持有利于增长的预算案
item.description: 南非执政联盟中的第二大党民主联盟表示，只有在国家预算符合某些标准（包括更加重视经济增长）的情况下，该党才会支持国家预算。【原文：The Democratic Alliance, the second-biggest party in South Africa’s ruling coalition, said it would only support the national budget if it met certain criteria including placing more emphasis on economic growth.】

item.title: 美国否决七国集团影子舰队特遣部队计划，预示着更多变化
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，随着特朗普政府重新评估其在多边组织中的立场，美国已经拒绝了加拿大提出的建立一个特别工作组来应对俄罗斯所谓的 "影子油轮舰队 "的建议。【原文：The US has rejected a Canadian proposal to establish a task force that would tackle Russia’s so-called shadow fleet of oil tankers, as the Trump administration re-evaluates its positions across multilateral organizations, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 卡尼接近实现领导加拿大的梦想，特朗普的威胁令加拿大震惊
item.description: 加拿大银行行长受到了严格的审查。几周来，媒体报道将马克-卡尼与可能竞选该国正在寻找新领导人的自由党联系在一起。【原文：The governor of the Bank of Canada was under scrutiny. For weeks, press reports had tied Mark Carney to a potential run for the country’s Liberal Party, which was looking for a new leader.】

item.title: 关税乱象丛生，特朗普究竟想干什么？
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统在竞选期间承诺将关税重新置于美国经济政策的中心位置，上任后他迅速采取行动，宣布对美国的贸易伙伴征收新的巨额进口税。【原文：After promising during his election campaign to put tariffs back at the center of US economic policy, President Donald Trump moved swiftly once back in office, announcing significant new import taxes aimed at America’s trading partners.】

item.title: 美联储主席戴利认为利率在不确定性升温中处于 "良好位置
item.description: 旧金山联邦储备银行行长玛丽-戴利（Mary Daly）表示，企业间日益增长的不确定性可能会减缓美国经济的需求，但并不需要改变利率。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of San Francisco President Mary Daly said growing uncertainty among businesses could slow demand in the US economy but doesn’t require a change in interest rates.】

item.title: 石油看跌，投机者押注更糟糕的还在后头
item.description: 本周，油价突然摆脱了长达数月的沉睡，触及三年来的最低点。现在，交易员们正在努力解决这一问题：油价下跌是否会更深？【原文：Oil prices suddenly broke out of a months-long slumber this week to touch a three-year low. Now, traders are grappling with the question of whether the rout can run deeper.】

item.title: 益普索民调显示，支持英国提高国防开支的人数增加
item.description: 益普索民意调查显示，英国人对英国增加国防开支的支持率有所上升，即使这意味着纳税人要承担更多负担。【原文：Approval among Britons for the UK to increase defense spending has risen, even if it means more burden on taxpayers, an Ipsos poll showed.】

item.title: 据说莱昂纳多将放弃美国银行，转而收购德意志银行的欧洲航天业务
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，意大利国防和航空航天公司莱昂纳多公司（Leonardo SpA）已将美国银行（Bank of America Corp.【原文：Leonardo SpA, the Italian defense and aerospace company, has replaced Bank of America Corp. with Deutsche Bank AG to advise on talks to forge a new European space and satellite champion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 体育运动中的包容，董事会中的分化
item.description:
本期《华尔街周报》关注体育投资 以及投资者为促进宗教信仰而施展拳脚的情况。【原文：

This Wall Street Week looks at investing in sports and at investors flexing their muscles to further their religious faith. 

】

item.title: 匈牙利新任央行行长称需要采取有纪律的政策
item.description: 匈牙利中央银行新任行长在其首次公开讲话中表示，以可持续的方式使匈牙利通胀率回归目标是该行的主要目标。【原文：Returning Hungary’s inflation rate to target in a sustainable way is the key goal for the nation’s central bank, its new chief said in his first public remarks.】

item.title: 购买了特朗普 "促进增长 "议程的投资者现在要为此付出代价了
item.description: 华尔街又开始紧张了，但这次的罪魁祸首不是通货膨胀。相反，大小股票投资者都被美国经济增长放缓的恐惧所笼罩。【原文：Wall Street is on edge again, but the culprit this time isn’t inflation. Instead, equities investors large and small are gripped by fear of slowing economic growth in the US.】

item.title: 马里将恢复两年多前暂停的采矿许可
item.description: 马里将从 3 月 15 日起恢复发放矿产勘探许可证。【原文：Mali will resume granting permits for mineral exploration as of March 15 after the process was suspended more than two years ago.】
